description: Izumi is the headmistress at the kunoichi school up in the mountains. She was http://anidb.net/ch1847 [Onsokumaru]`s classmate at the Ninja Academy, back in the day. It is also hinted that there was some romantic involvement between them at some point. She cannot stand men who are weak or incompetent -- leading her to be feared by http://anidb.net/ch16768 [Sasuke] and friends.
name: Izumi
